root.name: Batman: Chaos in Gotham
root.description: OverviewBatman: Chaos in Gotham is a 2D action platformer developed by Digital Eclipse and published by Ubisoft for the Game Boy Color on April 16, 2001. The first Batman game to be based on the animated TV series The New Batman Adventures, players take on the role of Batman or Batgirl as they fight various criminals that escaped from Arkham Asylum, including Mr. Freeze, The Joker, Harley Quinn, Roxy Rocket, Poison Ivy, Bane, and Two Face.
